Package com.vaadin.addon.charts

Interface Summary
ChartClickListener Listener interface for click events on the chart's area
ChartSelectionListener Listener interface for chart selection events
LegendItemClickListener Listener interface for legend item click events
PointClickListener Listener interface for click events on the data points of the chart
 

Class Summary
Chart Chart is a Vaadin component that is used to visualize data.
ChartClickEvent The ChartClickEvent class stores information on click events anywhere on the area of the chart.
ChartOptions The ChartOptions extension configures a page local theme and other global options like localized texts for charts.
ChartSelectionEvent The ChartSelectionEvent class stores information on selection events on the chart's area.
LegendItemClickEvent The LegendItemClickEvent class stores information on click events on the charts's legend items.
PointClickEvent The PointClickEvent class stores data for click events on the points of the chart.
